item.title: 2022 Nissan Qashqai Exclusive - Mint Condition!
item.description:
Experience the perfect blend of style, performance, and safety with this exceptional 2022 Nissan Qashqai Exclusive!

Key Features

  • Engine: 1.3L Turbocharged with 160 HP
  • Safety: Intelligent Moving Object Detection & 360Â° Around View Monitor
  • Infotainment: 8-inch touchscreen with Apple CarPlay & Android Auto
  • Cargo Space: Up to 1,585 liters
  • Origin: Locally purchased from Massy Motors
  • Service History: Recently serviced at dealership

Vehicle Details

Feature Specification
Year 2022
Make Nissan
Model Qashqai
Trim Exclusive
Mileage 20,600 miles
Condition Used

Description

This 2022 Nissan Qashqai Exclusive is a testament to modern automotive excellence. With its low mileage of just 20,600 miles and recent dealership service, this vehicle is in pristine condition and ready for its next owner.
